00010 
00011 CellTriang::CellTriang( Material& material_in,
00012             double alpha_in,
00013             int nGPoints_in,
00014             double x1_in, double y1_in,
00015             double x2_in, double y2_in,
00016             double x3_in, double y3_in
00017           )
00018   : Cell( material_in
00019         , alpha_in
00020         , nGPoints_in
00021         )
00022 {
00023   points(0,0) = x1_in; points(0,1) = y1_in; points(0,2) = 1.;
00024   points(1,0) = x2_in; points(1,1) = y2_in; points(1,2) = 1.;
00025   points(2,0) = x3_in; points(2,1) = y3_in; points(2,2) = 1.;
00026 
00027   this->jacobian = 0.5*points.determinant();
00028 //   cout << "Points: " << this->points << endl;
00029 //   cout << "Jacobian: " << this->jacobian << endl;
00030 
00031   double dcx = (std::abs(x2_in-x1_in) + std::abs(x3_in-x1_in) + std::abs(x3_in-x2_in)) / 3.;
00032   double dcy = (std::abs(y2_in-y1_in) + std::abs(y3_in-y1_in) + std::abs(y3_in-y2_in)) / 3.;
00033   
00034   this->createGaussPoints( dcx, dcy );
00035 }

00037 
00038 CellTriang::CellTriang( Material& material_in,
00039                         double alpha_in,
00040                         int nGPoints_in,
00041                         Node* n1_in,
00042                         Node* n2_in,
00043                         Node* n3_in
00044                       )
00045   : Cell( material_in
00046         , alpha_in
00047         , nGPoints_in
00048         )
00049 {
00050   threeNodes.push_back( n1_in );
00051   threeNodes.push_back( n2_in );
00052   threeNodes.push_back( n3_in );
00053 
00054   points(0,0) = n1_in->getx(); points(0,1) = n1_in->gety(); points(0,2) = 1.;
00055   points(1,0) = n2_in->getx(); points(1,1) = n2_in->gety(); points(1,2) = 1.;
00056   points(2,0) = n3_in->getx(); points(2,1) = n3_in->gety(); points(2,2) = 1.;
00057 
00058   this->jacobian = 0.5*points.determinant();
00059 
00060   double dcx =
00061         ( std::abs( n2_in->getx() - n1_in->getx() )
00062         + std::abs( n3_in->getx() - n1_in->getx() )
00063         + std::abs( n3_in->getx() - n2_in->getx() ) ) / 3.;
00064   double dcy =
00065         ( std::abs( n2_in->gety() - n1_in->gety() )
00066         + std::abs( n3_in->gety() - n1_in->gety() )
00067         + std::abs( n3_in->gety() - n2_in->gety() ) ) / 3.;
00068 
00069   
00070   this->createGaussPoints( dcx, dcy );
00071 }

00078 void CellTriang::computeShapeFunctions(  )
00079 {
00080   for ( std::vector<GaussPoint*>::iterator it = gPoints.begin();
00081         it != gPoints.end();
00082         ++it)
00083   {
00084     (*it)->shapeFunSolve( 1.03 );
00085   }
00086 }

00089 void CellTriang::createGaussPoints( double& dcx_in, double& dcy_in, double dcz_in )
00090 {
00091   lmx::DenseMatrix<double> gCoef( size_type(nGPoints), 4);
00092 
00093   if (nGPoints == 1){
00094     gCoef(0,0) = 1./3.; gCoef(0,1) = 1./3.; gCoef(0,2) = 1./3.; gCoef(0,3) = 1.;
00095  }
00096   else if(nGPoints == 3){
00097     gCoef(0,0) = 0.5; gCoef(0,1) = 0.5; gCoef(0,2) = 0. ; gCoef(0,3) = 1./3.;
00098     gCoef(1,0) = 0. ; gCoef(1,1) = 0.5; gCoef(1,2) = 0.5; gCoef(1,3) = 1./3.;
00099     gCoef(2,0) = 0.5; gCoef(2,1) = 0. ; gCoef(2,2) = 0.5; gCoef(2,3) = 1./3.;
00100   }
00101   else if(nGPoints == 4){ //must be checked
00102     gCoef(0,0) = 1./3.; gCoef(0,1) = 1./3.; gCoef(0,2) = 1./3.; gCoef(0,3) = -27./48.;
00103     gCoef(1,0) = 0.6; gCoef(1,1) = 0.2; gCoef(1,2) = 0.2; gCoef(1,3) = 25./48.;
00104     gCoef(2,0) = 0.2; gCoef(2,1) = 0.6; gCoef(2,2) = 0.2; gCoef(2,3) = 25./48.;
00105     gCoef(3,0) = 0.2; gCoef(3,1) = 0.2; gCoef(3,2) = 0.6; gCoef(3,3) = 25./48.;
00106   }
00107   else if(nGPoints == 6){ //must be checked
00108     double alpha1 = 0.8168475730;
00109     double alpha2 = 0.0915762135;
00110     double beta1 = 0.1081030182;
00111     double beta2 = 0.4459484909;
00112     gCoef(3,0) = beta1; gCoef(3,1) = beta1; gCoef(3,2) = alpha1; gCoef(3,3) = 0.0549758718;
00113     gCoef(1,0) = alpha1; gCoef(1,1) = beta1; gCoef(1,2) = beta1; gCoef(1,3) = 0.0549758718;
00114     gCoef(2,0) = beta1; gCoef(2,1) = alpha1; gCoef(2,2) = beta1; gCoef(2,3) = 0.0549758718;
00115     gCoef(3,0) = beta2; gCoef(3,1) = beta2; gCoef(3,2) = alpha2; gCoef(3,3) = 0.1116907998;
00116     gCoef(4,0) = alpha2; gCoef(4,1) = beta2; gCoef(4,2) = beta2; gCoef(4,3) = 0.1116907998;
00117     gCoef(5,0) = beta2; gCoef(5,1) = alpha2; gCoef(5,2) = beta2; gCoef(5,3) = 0.1116907998;
00118   }
00119   else if(nGPoints == 7){
00120     double alpha1 = 0.0597158717;
00121     double alpha2 = 0.7974269853;
00122     double beta1 = 0.4701420641;
00123     double beta2 = 0.1012865073;
00124     gCoef(0,0) = 1./3.; gCoef(0,1) = 1./3.; gCoef(0,2) = 1./3.; gCoef(0,3) = 0.225;
00125     gCoef(1,0) = alpha1; gCoef(1,1) = beta1; gCoef(1,2) = beta1; gCoef(1,3) = 0.1323941527;
00126     gCoef(2,0) = beta1; gCoef(2,1) = alpha1; gCoef(2,2) = beta1; gCoef(2,3) = 0.1323941527;
00127     gCoef(3,0) = beta1; gCoef(3,1) = beta1; gCoef(3,2) = alpha1; gCoef(3,3) = 0.1323941527;
00128     gCoef(4,0) = alpha2; gCoef(4,1) = beta2; gCoef(4,2) = beta2; gCoef(4,3) = 0.1259391805;
00129     gCoef(5,0) = beta2; gCoef(5,1) = alpha2; gCoef(5,2) = beta2; gCoef(5,3) = 0.1259391805;
00130     gCoef(6,0) = beta2; gCoef(6,1) = beta2; gCoef(6,2) = alpha2; gCoef(6,3) = 0.1259391805;
00131   }
00132   // more on ... http://electromagnetics.biz/2D%20Gauss.txt
00133 //   else if(nGPoints == 12){
00134 //   }
00135 //   else if(nGPoints == 20){
00136 //   }
00137 
00138   for (int i=0; i<nGPoints; ++i){
00139       gPoints.push_back( new GaussPoint( this->alpha,
00140                                          gCoef(i,3),
00141                                          jacobian,
00142                                          mat,
00143                                          i,
00144                                          points(0,0) * gCoef(i,0) + points(1,0) * gCoef(i,1) + points(2,0) * gCoef(i,2),
00145                                          points(0,1) * gCoef(i,0) + points(1,1) * gCoef(i,1) + points(2,1) * gCoef(i,2),
00146                                          0,
00147                                          dcx_in,
00148                                          dcy_in
00149                                        )
00150                        );
00151   }
00152 }

00168 
00169 void CellTriang::initialize( std::vector<Node*> & nodes_in )
00170 {
00171 //   cout << "CellTriang points " << this->points << endl;
00172 
00173   // This function can be joined with assembleGaussPoints so the Gpoints are iterated only once...
00174   for ( std::vector<GaussPoint*>::iterator it = gPoints.begin();
00175         it != gPoints.end();
00176         ++it)
00177   {
00178     (*it)->findSupportNodes( nodes_in );
00179   }
00180 }

00182 
00183 void CellTriang::gnuplotOut( std::ofstream& data, std::ofstream& gpdata )
00184 {
00185   for (int i=0; i<3; ++i){
00186     data << points(i,0) << " " << points(i,1) << " 0\n";
00187   }
00188   data << points(0,0) << " " << points(0,1) << " 0\n";
00189   data << std::endl;
00190 
00191   for(std::vector<GaussPoint*>::iterator it=gPoints.begin();
00192       it!=gPoints.end();
00193       ++it){
00194         (*it)->gnuplotOut( gpdata );
00195       }
00196 }
